日媒：台海危機後 李登輝任內研發準中程彈道飛彈
07 Nov 2019, 12:46 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, 中央通訊社
（中央社記者楊明珠東京7日專電）日本「產經新聞」今天頭版頭條新聞報導，受到1995至1996年之間發生台灣海峽飛彈危機的影響，為了對抗中國，前總統李登輝執政時期曾推動研發「準中程彈道飛彈」（MRBM）。
日本產經新聞獨家取得機密資料顯示，台灣曾推動研發彈道飛彈。這份資料記載1997年12月17日總統的諮詢機關國家安全會議幹部會議紀錄要點等的影本。當時的國防部長蔣仲苓在會議上強調國防政策當中「威嚇遏止力」的重要性。
資料記載蔣仲苓說：「如果將來中程彈道飛彈研發成功的話，可擁有有效的遏止力對付中共。」



產經指出，之前曾有媒體報導李登輝執政時期研發飛彈的計畫，但不知開發的時期、是政府內部的何種層級在推動。從這次取得的資料可知，受到台海危機的影響，台灣重視研發彈道飛彈的計畫，是政府整體在推動，而非末端的研究機關在推動。
李登輝執政後，陳水扁政府（2000至2008年）上台，扁政府最後一任國防部長蔡明憲2011年出版的回憶錄記載，2008年2月至5月的期間，在陳水扁出席的情況下，進行了飛彈實驗，在「飛越一般中程飛彈的距離」的階段就讓引擎停止運作了。
參與這項實驗的相關人士接受產經新聞採訪時表示，射程超過1000公里，實驗成功後進入量產。
這位相關人士說，在台灣，短程飛彈是射程在600公里以內、中程飛彈是射程在600至2000公里以內、長程飛彈是射程在2000公里以上。
產經報導，如果以這個分類來看，李登輝執政時期研發的飛彈不是美國標準所謂的「中程彈道飛彈」（IRBM，射程3000至5500公里），而是相當於「準中程彈道飛彈」（MRBM，射程1000至3000公里）。陳水扁政府末期進行試射是否為彈道飛彈，目前還不清楚。
報導說，台灣的國防部相關人士透露，李登輝執政時期推動研發的彈道飛彈引擎技術目前被運用於「雄風2E」巡弋飛彈的一部分，做為實戰部署，射程可及中國大陸的上海以北。
產經刊登台海危機的小檔案指出，在1996年3月台灣首度實施總統由公民直選，中國從1995年夏天開始到這場總統直選之前，進行大規模的軍事演習與彈道飛彈試射，台海局勢緊張。1996年3月，中國發射短程彈道飛彈「東風（DF）15」，落點在基隆與高雄的外海，美國派遣2個航空母艦戰鬥群到台灣近海牽制中國。（編輯：馮昭）1081107

Japanese media: After the Taiwan Strait crisis, Lee Teng-hui’s R&D quasi-medium-range ballistic missile
07 Nov 2019, 12:46 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, Central News Agency
(Central News Agency reporter Yang Mingzhu, Tokyo, 7th) Japan’s "Sankei Shimbun" today’s headline news report was affected by the Taiwan Strait missile crisis between 1995 and 1996. In order to confront China, former President Lee Teng-hui promoted research and development during his administration. Quasi-middle-range ballistic missiles (MRBM).
Japan’s Sankei News exclusive access to confidential information shows that Taiwan has promoted the development of ballistic missiles. This document documents the photographs of the main points of the minutes of the presidential advisory body of the National Security Council meeting on December 17, 1997. At that time, the Minister of National Defense, Jiang Zhongkai, emphasized the importance of "intimidation and suppression" in the national defense policy.
According to the information, Jiang Zhongkai said: "If the medium-range ballistic missiles are successfully developed, they can have effective containment against the CCP."



The Sankei pointed out that there were media reports on the development of missiles during Lee Teng-hui’s administration, but I don’t know what stage of development is driving the government. According to the information obtained this time, due to the impact of the Taiwan Strait crisis, Taiwan attaches great importance to the development of ballistic missiles, which is promoted by the government as a whole, rather than the end of the research institutions.
After Lee Teng-hui came to power, the Chen Shui-bian government (2000-2008) came to power. The last memorandum of defense of the Bian government, Cai Mingxian, published a memoir in 2011. During the period from February to May 2008, Chen Shui-bian attended the missile experiment. The engine stopped working at the stage of "flying over the distance of a medium-range missile."
Relevant people involved in the experiment said in an interview with the Sankei Shimbun that the range exceeded 1,000 kilometers and the mass production was successful after the experiment.
The relevant person said that in Taiwan, short-range missiles have a range of less than 600 kilometers, medium-range missiles have a range of 600 to 2000 kilometers, and long-range missiles have a range of more than 2,000 kilometers.
According to the Sankei Shimbun, if this classification is used, the missile developed during Lee Teng-hui’s administration is not the so-called “medium-range ballistic missile” (IRBM, with a range of 3,000 to 5,500 kilometers), but the equivalent of a “quasi-mid-range ballistic missile” ( MRBM, with a range of 1000 to 3000 km). It is unclear whether the Chen Shui-bian government’s final test launch is a ballistic missile.
According to reports, relevant personnel from the Ministry of National Defense of Taiwan revealed that the ballistic missile engine technology promoted by Lee Teng-hui during the administration period is currently being used as part of the "Xiong 2E" cruise missile. As a practical deployment, the range is reachable to the north of Shanghai in mainland China.
The small archives that produced the Taiwan Strait crisis pointed out that in March 1996, Taiwan first implemented the presidential direct election of citizens. Before the summer of 1995, China began a large-scale military exercise and ballistic missile test, the situation in the Taiwan Strait. tension. In March 1996, China launched a short-range ballistic missile "Dongfeng (DF) 15", which was located in the outer seas of Keelung and Kaohsiung. The United States dispatched two aircraft carrier battle groups to Taiwan to contain China. (Editor: Feng Zhao) 1081107
